--- title: Without side padding category: jumbotron order: 1 description: If you don't want the side padding on a jumbotron, just add the jumbotron-fluid class. You can then add an element with .container or .container-fluid inside the jumbotron to align the content to the grid.

This variation is handy if you want to apply a full-bleed background to the jumbotron itself. ---

No side padding

Ok, well there is side padding, but not on the Jumbotron itself. The side padding here comes from the .container-fluid inside the jumbotron.
